Question: Shenzhen Sensvision Intelligent Tech Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Sensvision Intelligent Tech Co., Ltd

Trail Camera

- Features faster trigger time, IP66 waterproof, long detection range, super night vision, long-time standby, and sharp image quality
- Adopted for widespread use by outdoor explorers in hunting, security, and other fields
- Offers 48MP wildlife night vision dual lens WiFi 4K trail camera and other related products

Night Vision Binocular

- Offers outdoor spotting scope monocular telescope with a 24MP WiFi eyepiece camera
- Provides manufacturer app control cellular hunting camera with wireless 4G LTE trail camera

Night Vision Scope

- Specializes in night vision scopes and related products
- Offers products for home security, wildlife monitoring, farm burglar, and hunting

Spotting Scope

- Provides outdoor spotting scope monocular telescope with a 24MP WiFi eyepiece camera
- Offers a wide range of scopes catering to various outdoor activities
